title: PLAY button doesnt work
body: As the title states, i can't start a game. I click the PLAY button, I hear the sound, but nothing happens. Everything else works just fine, just can't start a game.

replies.body: Update, I just tried logging on a second account I made to see if it made a difference and I was able to play on the second account. So why is it one account works and one doesn't?

I went through the guide, everything looks fine, nothing changed. I just don't get it, I was playing less than an hour before it stopped working. Nothing on my computer has changed, settings, firewall. All of a sudden I couldn't play. As I said before, everything else works, the store, my profile, hextech, just can't start a game.

This will typically happen if there's an issue with your connection reaching out login servers. I suggest working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as your first step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
